item.title: Mengatasi Masalah Tidak Dapat Mengambil Peta Situs
item.author: jhondoe@gmail.com (John Doe)
item.description: Beberapa waktu yang lalu saya menemukan sebuah pertanyaan dari member grup Blogger Indonesia di Facebook, yang mengalami masalah saat submit sitemap atau peta situs.

item.title: Gajian Pertama Dari Seedbacklink
item.author: jhondoe@gmail.com (John Doe)
item.description: Sekitar 3 bulan yang lalu saya mencoba kembali peruntungan mencari cuan dari internet melalui blog.

item.title: Example Content with Header Image
item.author: jhondoe@gmail.com (John Doe)
item.description: How to config add header? # You must add images field array and paste image url in array.

item.title: Example Disable ToC (Table Of Content)
item.author: jhondoe@gmail.com (John Doe)
item.description: How to configure disable toc? # You need to add the toc:false .

item.title: Example with ToC (Table Of Content)
item.author: jhondoe@gmail.com (John Doe)
item.description: How to configure enable toc? # By default toc is enable, and And if you want to make sure the toc is active, you need to add the toc:true .

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.author: jhondoe@gmail.com (John Doe)
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Emoji Support
